summary:
Passionate and Results-Driven Professional | Master in Marketing and International Economics | Former Soccer Player

Welcome to my LinkedIn profile! I am a dedicated and goal-oriented professional with a passion for achieving excellence in every endeavor. With a migration background from Montenegro, I have embraced the values of determination and perseverance, which have shaped my journey thus far.

My academic journey led me to the prestigious Erasmus University, where I successfully completed my Master's degree in Marketing and International Economics. This program provided me with a strong foundation in business strategy, market analysis, and consumer behavior, enabling me to develop a keen understanding of the global marketplace.

Having a background as a former soccer player, I bring the same level of discipline, teamwork, and resilience to my professional life. I thrive in challenging environments and continuously seek opportunities to excel and make a positive impact.

For the past six years, I have been an integral part of the dynamic team at KPN, one of the leading telecommunications companies in the Netherlands. I began my journey at KPN in the SME department, where I honed my strategic skills by working on various projects to drive growth and improve customer satisfaction. Through these experiences, I developed a comprehensive understanding of the telecommunications industry and its evolving landscape.

Currently, I am part of the Large Corporate Enterprise (LCE) team, where I have transitioned into a sales role. This opportunity has allowed me to leverage my strategic background to identify and seize business opportunities, cultivate relationships with key stakeholders, and drive revenue growth. I am passionate about understanding customer needs and providing tailored solutions that deliver tangible results.

Outside of my professional pursuits, I actively engage in personal development and stay updated with the latest industry trends. I believe in continuous learning and seek to expand my knowledge base through networking, attending conferences, and taking part in relevant training programs.

If you are looking for a driven professional who brings a strategic mindset, sales acumen, and a dedication to achieving the best outcomes, I would welcome the opportunity to connect and explore potential collaborations.

Let's connect and embark on a journey of growth and success together!

#PassionateProfessional #SalesExpertise #StrategicMindset #Networking

certifications.name: Microsoft Certified: Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals

profile_positions.description:
-Successfully managed a portfolio of large corporate customers, driving new business growth and achieving annual sales targets.
-Developed and executed strategic plans to expand customer base and increase market share in the digitalization, sustainability, cybersecurity, and strategy sectors.
-Conducted thorough market research and analysis to identify potential customers and understand their specific needs and pain points.
-Built strong relationships with key stakeholders within corporate organizations, including C-level executives, to establish trust and position the company as a strategic partner.
-Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams, such as sales, marketing, and product development, to ensure seamless customer onboarding and product/service delivery.
-Led discussions and presentations with potential customers, showcasing the company's digitalization, sustainability, cybersecurity, and strategic offerings and how they align with their business objectives.
Implemented customer success strategies to ensure high levels of customer satisfaction, retention, and ongoing engagement.
-Stayed abreast of industry trends and emerging technologies related to digitalization, sustainability, cybersecurity, and strategy, and shared relevant insights with customers to help them stay competitive.
-Actively participated in industry events, conferences, and networking opportunities to expand professional network and generate new leads.
-Collaborated with internal teams to develop and refine sales and marketing collateral tailored to corporate customers' needs.
-Monitored and analyzed sales data and market trends to identify opportunities for business growth and optimization..
profile_positions.title: Commercial Development LCE

profile_positions.description:
-Led the efforts to strike a balance between achieving sales numbers and delivering customer value in a dynamic environment, utilizing weekly and quarterly steering mechanisms.
-Demonstrated a deep understanding of market dynamics, including competitive landscape analysis, to identify potential opportunities and determine the optimal positioning for KPN.
-Developed and executed strategic plans to drive sales growth and increase market share, aligning with the organization's goals and objectives.
-Conducted comprehensive market research and analysis to identify emerging trends, customer needs, and competitor strategies, providing valuable insights for decision-making processes.
-Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams, including sales, marketing, and product development, to align sales strategies with overall business objectives and ensure seamless execution.
-Leveraged market intelligence to design effective pricing strategies, promotional campaigns, and product/service offerings that resonated with target customers and maximized value.
-Monitored key sales performance indicators, such as revenue, market penetration, and customer acquisition/retention rates, and made data-driven recommendations to optimize sales efforts.
-Cultivated relationships with key stakeholders, both internally and externally, including partners, customers, and industry influencers, to enhance KPN's reputation and expand business opportunities.
-Stayed updated on industry developments, technological advancements, and customer demands, actively seeking innovative approaches to stay ahead of the competition and drive growth.
-Collaborated with the marketing team to develop compelling messaging and positioning strategies that effectively communicated KPN's value proposition and differentiated offerings in the market.
profile_positions.title: Strategisch Distributiemanager Zakelijke Markt

profile_positions.description: In the simplest terms, business development can be summarized as the ideas, initiatives, and activities aimed towards making a business better. This includes increasing revenues, growth in terms of business expansion, increasing profitability by building strategic partnerships, and making strategic business decisions.
profile_positions.title: Business Development and Partner Alignment KPN Partner Network

profile_positions.description: As Business Development Manager I identify market opportunity's, analyse and translate gained information (big data) into business development projects and with our new developed leadgeneration tool we help our business partners in their ambition for growth by combining the best data with the fast execution through our business partners
